text: Just following up on this, we dont have any plans currently on  this but it is on our radar of things to look into.
Is it possible to add a row to a HubDB table from a HubSpot form submission?
Hey Robert, not in app currently, you would need to use the APIâ€™s in order to make that happen.
Thanks! Any good resources to learn how to use HubSpots APIs? When trying to make AJAX requests I keep getting blocked by the CORS policy.

Hey Robert, we have an intro to HubSpot APIs course. Though that does not cover CORS if memory serves me right.
<https://academy.HubSpot.com/courses/introduction-to-HubSpot-apis?library=true>
